events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on April 1st, requesting to open a new claim.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer’s vehicle in a collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case promptly, ensuring the customer receives immediate assistance.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and the initiation of processing procedures.
The customer was asked to provide a police report, damage photos, and repair estimate documents for further investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents on time, including detailed photos of the vehicle damage and the police collision report.
Claims investigation commenced to verify the extent of damages and liability based on submitted evidence and reports.
Investigation concluded successfully, confirming the collision details matched customer’s statements without discrepancies.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs was prepared and sent to the customer for review and approval.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the fairness of the offered amount.
Approval of the claim was granted following the customer’s acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount was issued to the customer’s designated bank account promptly.
The claim was officially closed after confirming the customer received payment and was satisfied with the claim resolution.
